data.lyric:
[ti:Flaws And Sins (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Death Race For Love (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Flaws And Sins (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:00.15]Lyrics by：Jarad Higgins/Nick Mira
[00:00.31]Composed by：Jarad Higgins/Nick Mira
[00:00.47]Vibe on this b***h though
[00:02.05]A lighter
[00:03.88]Nah in the room
[00:06.12]Oh
[00:06.48]Uh-huh
[00:12.43]You work numbers work wonders
[00:15.82]You done woke me up from my eternal slumber
[00:18.93]I'm the lightning you're the thunder
[00:22.00]There's a difference 'tween I need you and I want you
[00:24.59]Girl I need you
[00:25.58]Good sex led to conversations getting a little deeper uh
[00:28.86]Tell me your darkest secrets s**t you wouldn't even tell Jesus uh
[00:31.80]My karma been tweaking so much I don't even believe in karma
[00:35.33]But you give me a reason to thank God for all these recent falls
[00:39.03]Percocet 30 he ate all them getting off
[00:42.00]I done chilled out on the drugs since you've been involved
[00:45.16]Suck it like it's law f**k me like it's law
[00:48.53]No protection on my heart God d**nit I'm gon' hit it raw
[00:51.62]Traumatized from my past yeah I keep a log
[00:54.93]In my mind in my head where that s**t belong
[00:58.08]They say you after my bread s**t I hope they wrong
[01:00.99]You already ran up the bands we could have a ball
[01:04.36]Hit it from the back humina call a play huddle up
[01:07.77]This that good love in the bedroom
[01:10.93]F**k you in the Prada poke her face like Lady Gaga
[01:14.18]Ride it like a Mazda zoom zoom zoom
[01:17.25]I'm all I'm really all in
[01:20.62]In love with all your flaws and sins
[01:23.92]Your scars are really gorgeous
[01:27.29]Ain't that a weird way to give compliments
[01:30.52]I'm all I'm really all in
[01:33.29]I fell in love with all your flaws and sins
[01:36.71]Your scars are really gorgeous
[01:39.65]I see light in all the darkness
[01:42.97]Whoa
[01:43.65]'Atta boy I done turned to a man
[01:47.00]Hot chills when my skin is on your skin
[01:50.26]Hope that you know that if you ever try to end
[01:53.39]You gon' catch a couple out the F&N
[01:56.54]That mean Cupid ain't give you a headshot
[01:58.98]So I ain't got no choice but to leave you 
[02:00.95]With a headshot
[02:01.14]
[02:02.67]Look at the way I make that f**king bed rock uh
[02:05.41]Where your ring finger at I need wedlock
[02:08.18]Got my sights on your a** ooh red dot
[02:11.35]We some bats that made it out of Hell ooh red hot
[02:14.57]Don't ayy go all night b***h don't stop
[02:18.14]We ain't even gon' be finished 'til the sun's out
[02:21.42]I'm all I'm really all in
[02:24.81]In love with all your flaws and sins
[02:28.07]Your scars are really gorgeous
[02:31.28]Ain't that a weird way of giving compliments
[02:34.26]I'm all I'm really all in
[02:37.59]In love with all your flaws and sins
[02:40.74]Your scars are really gorgeous
[02:43.83]That's my way of giving compliments
[02:47.14]I'm all I'm really all in
[02:50.16]In love with all your flaws and sins
[02:53.66]Your scars are really gorgeous
[02:56.86]Ain't that a weird way to give compliments
[03:00.03]I'm all I'm really all in
[03:02.85]I fell in love with all your flaws and sins
[03:06.24]Your scars are really gorgeous
[03:09.17]I see light in all the darkness
data.trans:
[ti:Flaws And Sins (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Death Race For Love (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.15]//
[00:00.31]//
[00:00.47]这个妹子很兴奋
[00:02.05]像个打火机
[00:03.88]在房间里
[00:06.12]//
[00:06.48]//
[00:12.43]你工作赚钱 创造了奇迹
[00:15.82]你把沉睡的我唤醒
[00:18.93]我是闪电 你是雷声
[00:22.00]我需要你和我想要你这两句话是不一样的
[00:24.59]女孩 我需要你
[00:25.58]和谐的夫妻生活让我们的交流更加密切
[00:28.86]把你最大的秘密告诉我 那些连上帝都不知道的事情
[00:31.80]因果报应在我身上没有应验 我从来不信这种东西
[00:35.33]但是因为你 我会感谢上帝让我经历了那么多的挫折
[00:39.03]他吃了30片镇痛药 感觉飘飘然
[00:42.00]自从认识了你 我对这些东西就没了兴趣
[00:45.16]好好伺候我 和我尽情缠绵
[00:48.53]我已彻底敞开心扉 我不要做安全措施
[00:51.62]过去受过的伤 我都记得清清楚楚
[00:54.93]记在心里 记在脑子里  现在到哪去了
[00:58.08]他们说你跟我在一起是为了物质 我希望他们错了
[01:00.99]你已经把钱花光了 我们可以狂欢一场
[01:04.36]激情缠绵 美女 来玩角色扮演吧 缩成一团
[01:07.77]卧室里的美好让人回味
[01:10.93]穿着Prada和你亲热 戳戳你的脸蛋
[01:14.18]骑在你的身上
[01:17.25]我彻底沦陷了
[01:20.62]爱上了你的缺点和过错
[01:23.92]你的伤疤真迷人
[01:27.29]这种赞美人的方式还真奇怪 不是吗
[01:30.52]我彻底沦陷了
[01:33.29]爱上了你的缺点和过错
[01:36.71]你的伤疤真迷人
[01:39.65]我在黑暗中看见了光明
[01:42.97]//
[01:43.65]我从一个男孩成长为一个男人
[01:47.00]当我们紧紧相拥 欲火便得到了释放
[01:50.26]希望你明白 如果你要跟我分手
[01:53.39]你就只能挨枪子
[01:56.54]说明丘比特并没有射中你的心脏
[01:58.98]所以我别无选择 只能朝你的心脏
[02:00.95]打上一枪
[02:01.14]
[02:02.67]看看我们在床上多么激烈
[02:05.41]伸出你的无名指 我想结婚了
[02:08.18]我的眼睛盯着你的臀部 看到一个红点
[02:11.35]我们是从地狱飞出来的蝙蝠 红点
[02:14.57]整夜狂欢 不要停 碧池
[02:18.14]不到太阳出来 我们就不罢休
[02:21.42]我彻底沦陷了
[02:24.81]爱上了你的缺点和过错
[02:28.07]你的伤疤真迷人
[02:31.28]这种赞美人的方式还真奇怪 不是吗
[02:34.26]我彻底沦陷了
[02:37.59]爱上了你的缺点和过错
[02:40.74]你的伤疤真迷人
[02:43.83]这就是我赞美别人的方式
[02:47.14]我彻底沦陷了
[02:50.16]爱上了你的缺点和过错
[02:53.66]你的伤疤真迷人
[02:56.86]这种赞美人的方式还真奇怪 不是吗
[03:00.03]我彻底沦陷了
[03:02.85]爱上了你的缺点和过错
[03:06.24]你的伤疤真迷人
[03:09.17]我在黑暗中看见了光明
